response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its value to you stands at $1,200,000, and we aim to create a mutually beneficial arrangement. Our initial offer for the product is set at $1,400,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We are confident that this offer will be attractive to you given the significant value the product holds for you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
